评论概述: You Won't be Disappointed in Your Purchase!!
评论详情: Before ordering this Shacket I read all of the reviews (as I do with all of my Amazon purchases), most said to order your regular size or size down.  I contemplated on ordering a Large or Medium (my regular sizing for tops like this) and ended up ordering a Medium.  It was way too big on me so returned it and re-ordered a Small which fit me perfectly....size down ladies!  Loved it so much, I just ordered another one in the light blue.  The colors are as pictured.  This is the perfect button up or leave open Shacket...the waffling, dark buttons and overall look and feel of this is amazing!  It's looks great with jeans or leggings and is dressy enough for me to wear to work with black slacks.  These will be perfect for the Spring when the weather starts warming up.  You can't go wrong this Shacket....I Absolutely love!!

I bought this because of the material. It's the same material as waffle knit long johns sk it would be light weight and warm. Color is true to photos.  The problem is that whoever sewed the buttons on did it with both layers together. What that means is that no one checked if the button holes were to small for the button. That means you can't unbutton this sweater without ripping the button hole and it's true of ALL the buttons!  So while the color and fabric are perfect, well made and beautiful the garment is unusable!

评论概述: Pleasantly suprised by the quality of this shacket.
评论详情: There were a number of clothing items I had purchased in the past that were so thin and see-thru to the point where they shouldn't have been labeled as a waffle knit.
